entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
